segments.text: Let's get this card for mom , it's funny .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Brad , it's her birthday . Let's get her something really special .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I mean beautiful and heartfelt-something that will make her cry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Women like that kind of thing , beautiful thoughts that are touching .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think we should each get our own card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , you get your funny one and I'll get my beautiful one .
segments.speaker: S2
